description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The apartment has its original architecture and fixtures. It is a classic pre-war New York City style.  Beautiful day and evening light. Quiet.

Guest has access to the entire apartment.

I have a busy schedule but will be available if necessary.

The neighborhood is designated a New York City historic landmark. A diverse area, walking distance from The Shrine - Harlem's hot Afrobeat nightclub - and other new and trendy restaurants. A true New York City / Harlem experience.

One minute walk to the A, B, C and D trains. A and D trains run express. 
Also close to the 1 and 9 trains on Broadway. Columbia University and area trendy cafes and restaurants are about a ten minutes train ride.

The supermarket and laundromat are within two minutes walk. The neighborhood is both dynamic and peaceful.
name: Stay Here
review: It was great and very close to transit and food!
